local_intent: Execute the grasp: ensure bread visible and grasp pose available, confirm yaw 90°, align, pick (with retry), then verify stable grasp.
assumptions: Grasp pose for bread has been computed and stored under 'bread_grasp'
coherence_with_global: Matches global plan around Pick: visibility check/fallback, uses precomputed 'bread_grasp', maintains yaw 90°, aligns, performs Pick with retry, then checks IsGraspStable.
